Clients

Galvanizers

Electroplating

Powder Coating

Car & Appliances Manufacturing

Instruments Used

  • Oven & Temperature Profile

    To monitor the temperature in the oven during curing of applied powder coating

    Go to Elcometer™ page
  • Powder Thickness

    Non-contact measurement of the thickness of uncured powder coat material

    Go to Elcometer™ page
  • Dry Film Thickness

    Measure thickness of dry and cured powder coating, hot dipped galvanizing, electroplating, galvanizing, etc.

    Go to Elcometer™ page
  • Appearance

    Measure the glossiness of cured paints and coating

    Go to Elcometer™ page
  • Physical Test Equipment

    Test the physical properties of cured coating like hardness deformation, flexibility, and impact resistance

    Go to Elcometer™ page
  • Adhesion Testing

    Measure adhesion strength on substrate using digital instruments or mechanical methods of cross hatch, etc.

    Go to Elcometer™ page
